medical_history.chief_complaint: Fever and chills due to acute infective endocarditis of the tricuspid valve.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms of fever and chills began with a long history of intravenous drug abuse, leading to progressive sepsis despite antibiotic treatment.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of drainage of an infected left hip joint and multiple bilateral groin abscesses at the site of drug injection.
